## Kale Salad

<span class="mh">Servings:</span> 4-6 servings
<br>

<span class="mh">Ingredients:</span>  
<div class="my2cols">
<ul>
  <li>10 cups kale, cut finely</li>
  <li>1 cup dried cranberries</li>
  <li>2 garlic cloves, minced</li>
  <li>&frac14;-&frac13; cup lemon juice</li>
  <li>2 TBSP olive oil</li>
  <li>&frac13; tsp salt</li>
  <li>Dash of pepper</li>
  <li>1 cup halved pecans, toasted</li>
  <li>1&frac12; TBSP nutritional yeast</li>
</ul>
</div>
<br>
<span class="mh">Directions:</span> 
<div class="my2cols">
<ol>
  <li>Make dressing by whisking together
    <ul>
      <li>2 garlic cloves, minced</li>
      <li>&frac14;-&frac13; cup lemon juice</li>
      <li>2 TBSP olive oil</li>
      <li>&frac13; tsp salt</li>
      <li>Dash of pepper</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
    <li>Make pecan Parmesan by using a food processor to finally chop and mix:
    <ul>
      <li>1 cup halved pecans, toasted</li>
      <li>1&frac12; TBSP nutritional yeast</li>
    </ul>
  </li>
  <li>Combine kale, cranberries with dressing and toss</li>
  <li>Finally add pecan Parmesan and toss</li>
</ol>
</div>


<span class="mh">Notes:</span> Good on Thanksgiving or Christmas (winter celebration); lasts for a few days in refrigerator
